projects.name: Sales Metrics
features:
App built using ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, ApexCharts, Firebase,
Figma, Git.
projects.description:
Analytics dashboard app to let software businesses visualize their
sales data. Companies can upload a public Google Sheet to visualize
meaningful data about their business.

projects.name: Sales and Pricing page for AI startup
features: App built using NextJS, HTML5, CSS3, SCC, Zeit, Figma, Git.
projects.description: Pricing and Sales page for an AI starup based on their existing products.

projects.name: Novice Chef Recipe App
features: App built using ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, Heroku, Figma, Git.
projects.description: First try at Entrepreneurship, built and launched a single page app for foodies to search for recipes, turn it into a checklist and never again forget any ingredients when shopping for groceries.
